com.baselogic.aspects
Class ParentalAdvice

java.lang.Object
  com.baselogic.aspects.ParentalAdvice

public class ParentalAdvice
extends Object

ParentalAdvice Introductions (known as inter-type declarations in AspectJ) enable an aspect to declare that advised objects implement a given interface, and to provide an implementation of that interface on behalf of those objects.

Spring Certification objective: 2.1 AOP Recommendations

Spring Certification objective: 2.2 AOP Pointcuts

Spring Certification objective: 2.3 AOP Advice

2012
